title: [Large-Scale] Simulation/VR Learning Program Based on MOOC Programming Course Design Standards

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of programming fundamentals and basic VR device operation skills
context.additional_context: VR-based learning content utilization in a smartphone-centric, technology-limited environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core design criteria (instructional design, technical standards, e-assessment) of MOOC programming courses.
Learners can compare differences in programming/non-programming learners' needs using T-test analysis methods.

Learners will analyze components of science learning content (two videos, one interface, one assessment tool) in a VR simulation environment and propose optimization strategies meeting four or more of the five teacher-provided checklist items.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
